settings.title: Alfa Laval TJ (TJ20G)
settings.content:
Alfa Laval’s range of rotary jet head tank-cleaning devices provide exceptional cleanability, better end-product quality, greater overall output and up to 70% reduction in operating costs. They are designed for hygienic applications, such as food, dairy, personal care and beverages.

  • Avoid contamination with effective cleaning performance and superior self-cleaning features
  • Cost efficient and sustainable solution due to reduced water and chemicals requirements
  • More available production time because of reduced cleaning time
  • Easy to service and maintain – no special tools required
  • Control of CIP through validated cleaning
settings.button_text: Click here to find your product

settings.title: As an Alfa Laval master distributor we cover the full range of rotary jet heads from Alfa Laval - just reach out!
settings.html:
• TJ: The TJ range of rotary jet heads is designed for hygienic applications such as food, dairy, beverage and personal care. Available in various sizes and different configurations covering any tank size.
  • Barrel/Drum/IBC: The Alfa Laval GJ 7, Alfa Laval GJ BB and Alfa Laval GJ 9 are ideal for cleaning small tanks, barrels, drums and IBCs in wide range of applications.
  • GJ: The Alfa Laval GJ line of products are part of the Gamajet range, and are designed for industrial applications, such as paint, steel, pulp & paper, chemicals, and oil & gas.
  • GJ A: The Alfa Laval GJ A offers tank cleaning devices that are ideal for retrofit applications to replace resource-heavy static spray balls and costly manual cleaning within a wide range of applications
  • MultiJet: MultiJet range are designed for industrial application, such as paint, steel, Pulp & Paper, chemical applications. Available in various sizes and different configurations covering any tank size.
  • SaniJet: SaniJet range are designed for hygienic applications, such as food, pharmaceutical, personal care and biotechnology. Available in various sizes and different configurations covering any tank size.
  • T/TZ: T/TZ range is designed for hygienic applications such as food, dairy and beverage. Available in various sizes and different configurations covering any tank size.

settings.title: Looking for other products or need help to select the right product?
settings.content: We cover the full range of Alfa Laval products and our experts are ready to support you in selecting the right product for your needs - so do not hesitate to reach out!
